reviews.text:
I quite liked this station honestly. Lifts and ramps on each side allow for step free access to and between the platforms. The lifts were a bit small but they seemed to work fine enough. 

Car parking is free here and a ticket office is around with a single ticket machine inside of it. Buses to Sutton Coldfield stop outside and the staff were nice but the station could do with more seating and shelter.

Just popped into coleshill parkway. A very helpful gentleman behind the counter helped me get a cheaper way of getting to Temple meads in Bristol on Saturday around  £36 quid return. Not worth getting the car out and paying  £10 parking. No brainer

A modern station with decent amenities for its size. It is clean and tidy and staff are helpful. Parking at this station is free at the time of writing but the car park is usually full by around 10am.

Unfortunately, due to its location near a sewage treatment works, there are occasionally unpleasant smells.
Limited connectivity for weekends and almost non existent waiting room.
